GSD.description:
tcp: add accessors to read/set tp->snd_cwnd

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 41e191fe72282e193a7744e2fc1786b23156c9e4. For more details please see the references link.
